model_name: 1.2 Ton 4 Star Dual Inverter Split AC
description: Price ₹44990: Lloyd 1.2 Ton 4 Star Dual Inverter Split AC offers a cooling capacity of 1.2 Ton for ~14 m² rooms. Energy efficiency is 4-Star with inverter compression, and portability is 'Fixed' for the Split form factor. Comfort is moderately quiet at around 41 dB. Smart features: 4‑Way Swing. Ideal for Indian summers with an operating range of 18–45 °C.
